ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] How to Join The Dreamweavers!
ygData.msgSnippet: went to the site found no application to fill out. ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Yahoo! Autos - Get free new car price
ygData.messageBody:
went to the site found no application to fill out.
--- Dr Scurrilous PhD <psychoinhell@...> wrote:
> I only join guilds that have rules against online
> spamming
> :P
>
>
> --- ctn13771 <no_reply@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
> > Welcome to our Online Guildhall.
> >
> > To Join the Dreamweavers you need to
> >
> > 1. Read our Charter and make sure you meet our
> > qualifications.
> >
> > 2. Read our Rules, to see if you agree with them.
> >
> > 3. Fill out our Online Application Form. This lets
> us
> > know you are
> > interested and is required for all members to be
> added to
> > our roster.
> >
> > 4. Find some Dreamweavers in EverQuest and
> Chat/Group
> > with them. They
> > will become your 'sponsors'.
> >
> > 5. Contact an Officer online for an Interview. Let
> us
> > know you've
> > applied and who you've grouped and spoken with.
> >
> > After that we contact those Dreamweavers and ask
> how it
> > went.
> >
> > Our decision is based on compatibility. If you
> would fit
> > in with our
> > family you are invited. We do this to maintain
> guild
> > harmony and
> > ensure our members continued happiness.
> >
> > May Tunare Guide Your Path,
> > http://pub14.ezboard.com/bdreamweaversguild92445
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > ------------------------ Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
> >
> > To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
> > theeverquesttavern-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
> >
> >
> >
> > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> > http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
> >
> >
>
>
> =====
> Steve
> aka Dr. Scurrilous PhD.
>
>
> "Silence is argument carried out by other means."
> --Ernesto "Che" Guevara--
>
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Yahoo! Autos - Get free new car price quotes
> http://autos.yahoo.com
>
